name: Ratigan
subtitle: Very Large Mouse
author: Valerio Buonfantino

additional_info.title: FAQ 1
additional_info.body:
Q: If the only characters my opponent controls have greater than 3 strength can I still use Ratigan-Very Large Mouseâ€™s This is My Kingdom ability to ready one of my characters?

A: Yes, you can. You will not be able to exert any characters using the ability but you can still do as much as you can of the ability.

flavor_text: This time, nothing, not even Basil, can stand in my way!
rules_text: THIS IS MY KINGDOM When you play this character, exert chosen opposing character with 3 or less. Choose one of your characters and ready them. They can't quest for the rest of this turn.
